name: Dunk Dynasty
description: Forge your own fictional NBA franchise, build a roster of your favorite players (past and present) and establish the next NBA dynasty!

name: Journey Craft
description: Streamline your next getaway by creating a trip, searching from a selection of locations, and queue up a schedule of fun-filled activities.

name: BeatBuddy
description: Immerse yourself in the art of music curation as you effortlessly craft and discover playlists that resonate with your soul using BeatBuddy.

name: SIMON: NYC
description: Test your memory with a NYC-inspired twist on the classic short-term memory game, where players must match the computer's sequence of choices.
